title: My Husband And His Life Partner
itunes:title: My Husband And His Life Partner
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’ve been married for 27 years to a man that made a beautiful life for me and our 4 children. He’s been to every school program, graduation, medical appointment and each child’s extra-curricular activities. He’s showered me with gifts on special occasions and on ordinary days of the week. This is why I can’t believe what I have found out recently.................

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
